briefTitle: A Long-term Safety Study of Fluticasone Furoate (FF)/GW642444 in Japanese Subjects With COPD
officialTitle: A Long-term Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Fluticasone Furoate (FF)/GW642444 Inhalation Powder in Japanese Subjects With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
summary: The primary purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of fluticasone furoate/GW642444 inhalation powder when administered once-daily for 52 weeks in Japanese patients with COPD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Any Non-serious Adverse Event (AE) and Any Serious Adverse Event (SAE) Throughout the Treatment Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From the start of investigational product to the last dose of treatment (up to Week 52/Withdrawal [WD])
